column4: I am using linux for first time.well i am using dsl for the first time in my life.It said that it was built with knoppix technology.But as far as i know that knoppix is another distro of linux .So what it is meant by dsl is built using knoppix technology
This is the Ubuntu support channel, we don't support other distros here.  Your question may be better answered in ##linux
In a terminal, type man command
where command is the name of a command
